item.title: 建立个人仓库
item.description: hexo仓库 build.sh 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 #!/bin/bash npm install git submodule init git submodule update # https://www.haomwei.com/technology/maupassant-hexo.html npm install hexo-renderer-pug --save npm install hexo-renderer-sass --save #the great word 其中hexo仓库可以加上你需要的主题仓库 git submodule add https://github.com/tufu9441/maupassant-hexo.git themes/maupassant source仓库 makefile
